thread.section_title: Hotel Canada, BW Premier Collection - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Best hotel
thread.title_full: Best hotel - Review of Hotel Canada, BW Premier Collection, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Boulette-et-Gateau
title: Best hotel
text: Everything is perfect at this hotel! The staff is friendly and helpful. Everybody will greet you with a smile! Room with a nice decor, large enough and comfortable. Though the hotel has an old-fashioned touch to it, the bathroom is modern. Breakfast is available for 6 euros and you should definitely get it. It has everything from eggs to fresh fruits and croissants and yogourts and... just name it! The location makes it easy to go around. You can also find grocery stores and restaurants nearby. In Rome, it is the hotel to choose!
